sourcesContent:
import '../style/movie.css';
import {
    MDBCard,
    MDBCardTitle,
    MDBCardText,
    MDBCardBody,
    MDBCardImage,
    MDBRow,
    MDBCol,
    MDBIcon,
    MDBCardFooter,
} from 'mdb-react-ui-kit';

interface MovieProps {
    name: string;
    imageSRC: string;
    releaseDate: string;
    budget: number;
    revenue: number;
    rating: number;
}

const priceSplitter = (number: number) =>
    number && number.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, '.');

const Movie: React.FC<MovieProps> = ({
    name,
    imageSRC,
    releaseDate,
    budget,
    revenue,
    rating,
}) => {
    return (
        <MDBCard
            background="dark"
            className="text-white movieCard"
            alignment="center"
        >
            <MDBRow className="g-0 m-0">
                <MDBCol md="6">
                    <MDBCardImage
                        src={'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500' + imageSRC}
                        alt="Pôster do filme"
                        className="p-2 cardImage"
                        fluid
                    />
                </MDBCol>
                <MDBCol md="6">
                    <MDBCardBody>
                        <MDBCardTitle>{name}</MDBCardTitle>
                        <MDBCardText className="text-warning">
                            <MDBIcon far icon="star" className="me-2" />
                            {rating}
                        </MDBCardText>

                        <MDBCardText className="text-warning">
                            <small>
                                "Eles são uma desgraça para criminosos em todo
                                lugar."
                            </small>
                        </MDBCardText>

                        <MDBCardText className="m-0 g-0">
                            <small>
                                <MDBRow>
                                    <MDBCol fluid>Lançamento:</MDBCol>
                                </MDBRow>
                                <MDBRow>
                                    <MDBCol fluid className="text-success">
                                        <MDBIcon
                                            fas
                                            icon="calendar-alt"
                                            className="me-2"
                                        />
                                        {releaseDate}
                                    </MDBCol>
                                </MDBRow>
                            </small>
                        </MDBCardText>
                        <MDBCardText className="m-0 g-0">
                            <small>
                                <MDBRow>
                                    <MDBCol fluid>Orçamento:</MDBCol>
                                </MDBRow>
                                <MDBRow>
                                    <MDBCol fluid className="text-success">
                                        <MDBIcon
                                            fas
                                            icon="dollar-sign"
                                            className="me-2"
                                        />
                                        {priceSplitter(budget)}
                                    </MDBCol>
                                </MDBRow>
                            </small>
                        </MDBCardText>
                        <MDBCardText className="m-0 g-0">
                            <small>
                                <MDBRow>
                                    <MDBCol fluid>Receita:</MDBCol>
                                </MDBRow>
                                <MDBRow>
                                    <MDBCol fluid className="text-success">
                                        <MDBIcon
                                            fas
                                            icon="dollar-sign"
                                            className="me-2"
                                        />
                                        {priceSplitter(revenue)}
                                    </MDBCol>
                                </MDBRow>
                            </small>
                        </MDBCardText>
                    </MDBCardBody>
                </MDBCol>
            </MDBRow>
        </MDBCard>
    );
};

export default Movie;
